articles.author: Paul Sawers
articles.title: Matt Mullenweg calls WP Engine a 'cancer to WordPress' and urges community to switch providers - TechCrunch
articles.description: Matt Mullenweg unleashed a no-holds-barred tirade at WP Engine, which has been commercializing WordPress since 2010.
articles.content:
Automattic CEO and WordPress co-creator Matt Mullenweg unleashed a scathing attack on a rival firm this week, calling WP Engine a “cancer to WordPress.”
Mullenweg criticized the company which has be… [+5236 chars]
